name: Paper Crane (Hope)
description: The main theme for this artwork is about hope. The first girl who have a deep hole at the back of her body shows that she is slowly losing hope and the reality is eating her. The second girl with a paper crane is a resemblance that she is trying to give hope for that girl. Paper crane origami is known as a symbol of hope hence why i put the paper crane all around her and the second girl with the origami that tried to put it inside the empty hole. Meanwhile the eyes nearby the empty hole is a resemblance of people that care for her is still looking up to her. I made this piece for those who started to lose hope. Do know that there's always someone that hoping and counting on you.
